sentences.english: Honey, if ex-boyfriends were dollars…you'd be loaded by now.
sentences.chinese: 如果前任男友能當錢，如今就是富婆了。

sentences.english: That rich lady is a friend of the arts.
sentences.chinese: 那位富婆是藝術的贊助者。

sentences.english: Her success as a popular singer made her a rich woman.
sentences.chinese: 作爲流行歌手，她取得的成功使她成爲了一個富婆。

sentences.english: Some rich women splurge on diamond rings and mink coats.
sentences.chinese: 有些富婆在鑽戒和貂皮外套上揮霍金錢。

sentences.english: She could have ended up a millionairess.
sentences.chinese: 她本可以成爲百萬富婆的。

sentences.english: She is one of the vulgar rich.
Not only the singers are good-looking, but also they are millionaires and millionairesses.
sentences.chinese: 他們不僅有光鮮亮麗的外表，而且都是富翁和富婆。

sentences.english: Sandra is a woman of great wealth.

definition: "Ms Perfect" (i.e. fair-skinned, rich and beautiful) (Internet slang)
"Mr Perfect" (i.e. tall, rich and handsome) (Internet slang)
children of entrepreneurs who became wealthy under Deng Xiaoping's economic reforms in the 1980s/see also 窮二代|穷二代[qiong2 er4 dai4]
poor wretch/pauper/destitute man/poverty-stricken peasant/penniless good-for-nothing/impecunious vagabond
to live off a rich man
lit. fifth child of the Wangs/bachelor
mistress/the other woman (coll.)/grade 3 in elementary school
